content: Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honore - 11 min walk

hotelWelcomeRewards.info: For every 10 stamps, get 1 reward* night!

propertyDescription.name: The Peninsula Paris
propertyDescription.starRatingTitle: This property has received its official star rating from the French Tourism Development Agency, ATOUT France.

featuredPrice.pricingTooltip: This is the average nightly price for your dates.

specialCheckInInstructions: Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. At check-in, guests must provide either a negative PCR COVID-19 test result or a record of full COVID-19 vaccination. The negative COVID-19 test result requirement applies to all guests aged 15 and up, and test must have been administered no more than 72 hours prior to check-in. COVID-19 vaccination record requirement applies to all guests aged 15 and up; guests must have received complete vaccination at least 7 days prior to check-in.
requiredAtCheckIn: Credit card, debit card, or cash deposit required for incidental charges
Government-issued photo ID may be required

children: Children stay free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding
pets: Pets stay free (dogs and cats only)

internet: Free WiFi and wired Internet access in rooms

healthAndSafetyMeasures.title: Enhanced health and safety measures
healthAndSafetyMeasures.description: This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place.
measures: Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures
Social distancing measures are in place
Gap period enforced between guest stays - 24 hours
Protective clothing is available to guests
Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer

mandatoryFees: • A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 5.00 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age.
optionalExtras: Rollaway beds are available for EUR 100.0 per night
Buffet breakfast is offered for an extra charge of EUR 64 per person (approximately)
Babysitting is available for an extra charge
policies:
For details on pet restrictions, contact the property at the number on the booking confirmation.

Guests can rest easy knowing there's a smoke detector, a security system, and window guards on site.

This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place.

Disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F; guestroom doors are sealed after cleaning; the property is cleaned and disinfected with electrostatic spray.

Personal protective equipment, including masks, will be available to guests.

Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; temperature checks are available to guests; guests are provided with hand sanitizer; contactless room service is available; masks are required in public areas; reservations are required for some onsite facilities.

Contactless check-in and contactless check-out are available.

Enhanced food service safety measures are in place.

Each guestroom is kept vacant for a minimum of 24 hours between bookings.

At check-in, guests must provide either a negative PCR COVID-19 test result or a record of full COVID-19 vaccination.

The negative COVID-19 test result requirement applies to all guests aged 15 and up, and the test must have been administered no more than 72 hours prior to check-in. COVID-19 vaccination record requirement applies to all guests aged 15 and up; guests must have received complete vaccination at least 7 days prior to check-in.

Reservations are required for massage services and can be made by contacting the property before arrival at the number on the booking confirmation.

This property accepts credit cards and cash.

additionalInfo.description:
2 Twin Beds

592-sq-foot room with city views


Layout - Bedroom and sitting area

Internet - Free WiFi and wired Internet access

Entertainment - Plasma TV with satellite channels and first-run movies

Food & Drink - Espresso maker, minibar, 24-hour room service, and free bottled water

Sleep - Egyptian cotton linens, a pillow menu, blackout drapes/curtains, and bed sheets

Bathroom - Private bathroom, bathrobes, and a separate bathtub and shower with a rainfall showerhead

Practical - Free long-distance calls, laptop-compatible safe, and free newspaper; rollaway/extra beds and free cribs/infant beds available on request

Comfort - Climate-controlled air conditioning and daily housekeeping

Accessibility - Wheelchair accessible

Non-Smoking

cancellation.title: Fully refundable
cancellation.info: You can cancel this booking right up to 06/09/22 for free. You may be charged if you cancel or change your booking after that. And we can’t refund you if you check out early or don’t turn up at the property.

sections.heading: Spa
sections.freeText: The Peninsula Spa has 8 treatment rooms including rooms for couples. Services include hot stone massages, facials, body wraps, and body scrubs. The spa is equipped with a sauna, a spa tub, a steam room, and Turkish bath/hammam. A variety of treatment therapies are provided, including aromatherapy and Ayurvedic.

sections.heading: Dining
sections.freeText:
L’Oiseau Blanc - This restaurant specializes in French cuisine and serves lunch and dinner. Guests can order drinks at the bar and enjoy alfresco dining (weather permitting).

Le Lobby - This restaurant specializes in international cuisine and serves breakfast, brunch, lunch, and dinner.

La Terrasse Kléber - This restaurant specializes in international cuisine and serves breakfast, lunch, dinner, and light fare. Guests can enjoy alfresco dining (weather permitting).

Le Bar Kléber - Onsite bar.

Lili - This restaurant specializes in Chinese cuisine and serves lunch and dinner.

sections.heading: Awards and affiliations
sections.freeText:
Green / Sustainable Property
This property participates in EarthCheck, a program that measures the property's impact on one or more of the following: environment, community, cultural-heritage, the local economy.

miscellaneous.legalInfoForStrikethroughPrices: The struck-out price is based on the property’s standard rate on our app, as determined and supplied by the property.
